actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that canceled checks shall be treated as prima facie evidence of any payment for which an income tax deduction is claimed.

summary.text: Stipulates that a canceled check shall be treated as prima facie evidence of any expenditure allowable as a tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that canceled checks shall be treated as prima facie evidence of any payment for which an income tax deduction is claimed.
